Reviews.Title: Diva BLU, not much of a DIVA!
Reviews.Author: Alan Lisemby "Luis"
Reviews.Content: I have order this phone as a gift for my mother who can't seem to find her way around an Andriod phone, my mother is 84 years old, so I thought this would be a suitable one, well it arrived and I got busy setting up the sim card and I went to the store and got a 2GB Micro-SD card, since the internal memory is ALL taken by the system, it has 0 zero space for NOTHING else.I connected the phone to the PC, put in a few songs my mom likes and added some pictures and a short video to test it.Well, the "Audio Player", will not recognize any MP3s on the external card, and there's not internal space, so no music, then the picture viewer will open the pictures well, but you cannot rotate one or the rest will also be rotated, the camera will take pics, but not a Wow quality, and the video player will only play AVI files (Only taken by the phone itself) so you cannot watch a video you transferred into the card yourself.The radio works great, but it is very hard to program stations into the memory.So the good: It will make calls clear and ok, radio is good sound and all and the phone though looks plasticky, still nice looking (I got the white one, cuz the silver was not available)The bad: It will not play videos satisfactory, it will not play music correctly and navigating the menus is a real task!2 stars is enough for this phone!

Reviews.Title: I highly recommend this product to anyone
Reviews.Author: Kumaravel Krishnan "Kumar"
Reviews.Content: So far it is working without any issues. As specified the phone works without any flow in GSM in Asian countries (India).
